org.pepstock.charba.client.utils.toast

Class Toaster

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.utils.toast.Toaster

  • public final class Toaster
extends Object
    Utility for displaying toast notifications with progress bars on the page.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

    • Field Summary

      static int MAXIMUM_OPEN_ITEMS
      Maximum amount of open and shown toasts.
